title: Which streaming service is most likely to include the original music used on a TV show? - Quora

response.answer_text: The issue isn’t the streaming service, but when the producers of the show try to clear the music rights so they then can, for example, sell the streaming rights of the show (including the music) to some streaming company. Those music rights are, for example, WKRP in Cincinnati and The Wonder Years weren’t available for streaming or even DVD sale for years.
